item.description:
Join your Mosaic friends for a night of Pictionary, Monopoly, Scrabble and other games, while you also enjoy a potluck dinner. If your last name begins with the following please bring: A-C – Appetizers, D-N, an entrée, O-T, a beverage, U-Z, dessert. Keep in many that many Mosaic members adhere to a Kosher diet. Feel free to bring a game with you.

Event's Host: Marla K

Meet: "Games Night” is going to be in Marla's home in Medford, she will send directions to people who respond. There is parking on the street and in the Fellsway Plaza parking lot near her home.

RSVP: Is needed and let her know what you intend to bring along for the dinner. There is a limit of 20 people for this event.

Cost: Only what you spend on your contribution for the dinner but consider becoming a full member of Mosaic ($25) membership applications will be available.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP for more details and direction's to the home of the Event's "Host"

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A Games Night and Potluck Dinner.
